quote: Getting ready to wrestle is like getting ready for a car crash. Getting ready to work with Brock Lesnar is like knowing you're going to get hit by a bus and the bus is going to back over you. If I'm going to work 'WrestleMania,' 16 weeks out I have to start training like I'm Mayweather getting ready for a fight.
author: Triple H

quote: Short stories, for me, it's like you step inside this brand new car and you drive it and you drive it into a tree and you walk away from it.
author: Kevin Wilson

quote: Basketball is what got me out of the projects. It got my momma the house she never had, the car she never had. Nobody is going to get the best of me. You might score more points than me, but you're going to know you were in a dogfight.
author: Kenyon Martin

quote: I went from buying my own condominium and a car for myself when I was 17 on 'The Facts of Life' to not being able to pay my rent. I was at the unemployment office all the time. I had to sell my record collection just to make ends meet. And then I started getting these voice-over jobs.
author: Pamela Adlon

quote: It's like, once you've seen Tom Hanks win the Golden Globes, the Oscars, you've seen his wife, what kind of car he drives, when you watch his movies, you can't fully get really lost in them.
author: Justin Theroux

quote: He's computerized, but I won't let him come on cold. I created KITT. I understand the personality of the car.
author: William Daniels

quote: We should be licensing everybody with a gun. I have to have a license for my dog. I have to have a license for my car. If you're going to do my hair later you have to have a license... We don't require a license to own a firearm?
author: Michael Moore

quote: A while ago I said that, 'You know, I like a guy - he doesn't have to be all rich and famous - he can be normal.' And I remember I was walking in the mall, and this guy was like, 'Tyra, I'm normal. I live with my mama. I ain't got a car and I ain't got a job! I'm real normal.' And I'm like, 'That's not normal - that's a loser!'
author: Tyra Banks

quote: A car is a 2,000 pound projectile that can go 100 miles an hour.
author: Jesse Ventura

quote: I'm sort of like a lame, single guy in a red sports car.
author: Billy Corgan

quote: I've loved car racing all my life. I watch NASCAR regularly, and drag racing because we have Raceway Park in New Jersey. I think I got it from my father.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: Cars mean nothing to me. I'm not a car guy.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: A Prius is not a true hybrid, really. The current Prius is, like, 2 percent electric. It's a gasoline car with slightly better mileage.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Winning 'Motor Trend' Car of the year is probably the closest thing to winning the Oscar or Emmy of the car industry.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I don't want to argue with my wife about her car - or my driving.
author: Dale Earnhardt

quote: Am I a car aficionado? No: for me, cars have always been just for transport. I didn't even know anyone who had a car until I was 14 or 15.
author: Michael Caine

quote: I love sleeping in a moving car more than sleeping in bed.
author: Ben Stein

quote: I pay for homeowner's insurance, I pay for car insurance, I pay for health insurance.
author: Elizabeth Warren

quote: You sell a screenplay like you sell a car. If someone drives it off a cliff, that's it.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: People who have car collections - I never understood that. I always thought that was unnecessary. It's not beautiful, it's not creative. It's just showing how much money you've got.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I think Tesla will most likely develop its own autopilot system for the car, as I think it should be camera-based, not Lidar-based. However, it is also possible that we do something jointly with Google.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Sometimes I keep a car for only a week or two. I like the newest and the flashiest.
author: Evel Knievel

quote: The creative process is mysterious; a conversation, a ride in the car, or a melody can trigger something.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: My first car, I got it in an auction at my temple. It was an '86 Volvo that I got for 500 bucks, and then wound up throwing $10,000 into the stereo system and put TVs in the foot rests. It was the most ridiculous Volvo you'd ever seen, but I had never had money before and I was out of my mind.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: You can get into a very fancy car and know everything about the engine, but when you drive in that car, you feel that rush. In the same way, I think the more you know about love, the more you can enjoy it. And knowing about your personality type, who you are and what kind of person you're dealing with gives you a great leg up.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: You can find out anything you want about a car now, and especially every bit of information about the price, without relying on the dealers.
author: Susan Orlean

quote: I sing in the car if I'm in LA, because you're like soundproofed.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: I would not advise people to buy a car or house without making a list. You will probably improve your intuitions by making a list and then sleeping on it.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: Fortunately for me, I'm married to an amazing woman - Nancy Lasseter - who is wise enough not to let me buy every car I want. If I was single, I would be living in a very small apartment and renting a warehouse full of cool cars.
author: John Lasseter

quote: I feel like so often I'm just, like, running around and eating in the car, which is, like, not good, or eating as I'm walking down the street.
author: Gillian Jacobs

quote: Car love is the sound of a throaty V-8 rumbling and revving, the acceleration throwing you back in the seat - especially when you get on a beautiful, winding road and the light's dappling through the trees.
author: John Lasseter

quote: I think you have to feel comfortable with your car. You have to go into turn one, every lap, with confidence. You have to be sure of yourself and your equipment.
author: Danica Patrick

quote: Be able to back up a car for a considerable distance in a straight line and back out of a driveway.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: If I go onstage, I want to give people everything they want and more. I'll wash their car for them on their way out.
author: Trent Reznor

quote: I'm probably more dangerous in a car than I am on a motorbike; on a bike I'm very mindful of the fact that if you make a mistake, you're dead.
author: James McAvoy

quote: The greatest luxury is not driving. I didn't own a car until I was 30, and that was a Rolls-Royce, so it was cheaper to insure a chauffeur. I never want to drive again. My mind is always on other things. I hate parking, and I'm very short-tempered and would get road rage, I'm sure.
author: Michael Caine

quote: It is definitely true that the fundamental enabling technology for electric cars is lithium-ion as a cell chemistry technology. In the absence of that, I don't think it's possible to make an electric car that is competitive with a gasoline car.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I didn't come from a trailer park. I grew up middle class and my dad had money and my mom made my lunch. I got a car when I was sixteen. I'm proud of that.
author: Kid Rock

quote: The only magazines I read are car magazines.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: 'Cars' is a really personal story for me because, first of all, I grew up in Los Angeles - the car crazy capital.
author: John Lasseter

quote: Even in the limo, I buckle my seatbelt. I got that seatbelt on before the car moves.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: We could definitely make a flying car - but that's not the hard part. The hard part is, how do you make a flying car that's super safe and quiet? Because if it's a howler, you're going to make people very unhappy.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I have a car but it's not important.
author: Eric Cantona

quote: You can know or not know how a car runs and still enjoy riding in a car.
author: David Byrne

quote: I'm a car nut. My father was a parts manager at a Chevrolet dealership.
author: John Lasseter

quote: 'Amores Perros' is three stories that interconnect in one moment, which is the car accident.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: I once went to one of those parties where everyone throws their car keys into the middle of the room. I don't know who got my moped, but I drove that Peugeot for years.
author: Victoria Wood

quote: I do find it amusing when somebody cuts me off, makes an aggressive move on me in a car. I'm like, 'Do you have any idea what I do for a living? Why?'
author: Jimmie Johnson

quote: I probably wouldn't be a good spokesman for an electric car, because I'll still get on a private jet, and one flight on a private jet undoes all my electric-car good deeds.
author: George Clooney

quote: When I was a kid, nobody in my family had a car. And I didn't have many toys. The only toys I had were the ones I would steal.
author: DMX

quote: It's so funny looking back, but my so-called overnight success actually took 15 years. I remember when I didn't have any money, and my only car was mom's Hyundai.
author: Criss Angel

quote: At least 50 times. I've jumped off a building, jumped off a cliff in a car. I've been in bedrooms when women came in with knives and guns.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: I did not want to spend the rest of my life not being able to ride in a nice car.
author: Shakira

quote: Yes, I did and a lot of my friends who are in the same program as I were very much supportive, and the most important thing they said to me is do not let this interfere with what you have to do in taking car of yourself. That was the most important thing.
author: Naomi Campbell

quote: I think I'm actually quite a materialistic person, I value what it takes to make a car or build a nice house. Money does change things, but how it changes people depends on how they react to it.
author: Roland Gift

quote: It just seemed too weird to me. I don't know, maybe they were smoking a joint in the car downstairs from their parents' apartment. I had to go that far to put together a scenario of how they could have possibly recognized me.
author: Marc Jacobs

quote: Unlike fuel-economy standards, the most common method of reducing demand for oil over the past thirty years, a gas tax doesn't tell people what kind of car to drive. It simply raises the price of gasoline and lets people adjust their behavior accordingly.
author: James Surowiecki

quote: I drive the same car that I've driven since I was 16. That's who I am.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: My first car was in 2006 when I got on my first TV show - a BMW 328i2 four-door sedan in slate grey. That was a great day, that was.
author: Rebecca Mader

quote: Acting advice is a bit like your parents teaching you how to drive a car. You know they're right, but you still kind of want them to shut up a bit.
author: Max Irons

quote: Besides my son, music is the most important thing to me. I always have music on in my car and playing at house, and I'm in the studio or performing every night. I like Beats by Dre for headphones, and Bang & Olufsen soundsystems.
author: French Montana

quote: The red carpet is kind of a surreal experience. There's nothing normal about it, so for me the most important thing is to maintain some normality right until the point you get out of the car.
author: Samantha Barks

quote: You get around people who see us away from the track, and it's a pretty big contrast. You're still competitive, and you still want to win everything, but I think in the car, we're focused and passionate all the time. We get outside the car, and we're a lot more relaxed and easygoing, enjoying things away from racing.
author: Tony Stewart

quote: My engineer dad is where my technical acumen comes from. I remember him taking me to the factories to see how what works. Often he used to open up his motorbike to fix things and I saw how the wheels worked. His car used to be open for dissection very regularly. All this taught me and inspired me to look beyond what I could see on the skin.
author: Bibhu Mohapatra

quote: Ferrari used to be the car that you kept in your garage, took out to polish and show, and put back into the garage.
author: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo

quote: When you're in your 20s, you're a little more carefree; you're single. You have a very different way of looking at the world and experiencing the world. But later in your 30s, when you have children, a career, career obstacles, mortgages, car payments and relationships, you have to negotiate; that's a very different life.
author: Melissa De Sousa

quote: I'm like, 'Would you be the person in the room that would boo when Dylan went electric? I know I wouldn't. Or are you the person that left The Beatles after 'She Loves You,' or 'Drive My Car?' You weren't on board for 'Revolution 9' or 'Day In The Life,' were you?'
author: Regina Spektor

quote: Since I was kid, what's drawn me to racing is the feeling inside of me, the passion I have for the sport, the feeling I have while competing and doing what I do in a car, on a bike, whatever it's been.
author: Jimmie Johnson

quote: So if you're a robot and you're living on this planet, you can do things that you can't do in real life - things that you wished you could do: like fly; like have a car that flies; like have furniture that is alive.
author: William Joyce

quote: The fact is I like Mumbai less and less. My son says, 'Baba, let's go for a drive', and I tell him, 'Where's the fun of a drive in this place?' You get caught in a million traffic jams, and you spend time cooped in your car with all that mad cacophony around you.
author: Om Puri

quote: No, in Lethal Weapon I was a taxi cab driver that Mel jumps in front of the taxi and pulls me out of the car and steals the taxi. Then I did some other indie driving for some of the car sequences.
author: David R. Ellis

quote: I love doing all of my own stunts. Anything. Even if they are telling me, 'No, no, no! You can't do that!' I'll do it. Like crashing my car through the gate, climbing up the building, kicking in a window... I love doing all of that stuff.
author: Christa Campbell

quote: YI teamed up with the Allstate Foundation to basically inform teens why it's important to drive safe. I feel I'm new on the road, so it's important to do these three main things: The first one is buckle up, the second one is slow down, don't speed, and the third one is don't let your friends distract you in the car.
author: Austin Mahone

quote: People generally complain that they're overburdened by responsibilities, forgetting that they chose to have those responsibilities. No one makes you work like a dog in order to live in a nice house, put your kids in nice schools, drive a smart car and go on exotic foreign holidays. It's up to you.
author: Mark Barrowcliffe

quote: When you're in a rehearsal room, it's like getting into a car and going on a long journey with everyone's stuff in the back. If you keep stopping the car and going, 'Are you sure we want to go?' and think, 'This is really daunting,' you will get frightened, so you just have to keep ploughing through it.
author: Kate Fleetwood

quote: I have very long legs and I hate driving anything unless it's a boat or an ATV in the jungle. I like to sit in the back of a car, where I can look out the window, answer my emails on my iPad, or hold hands with a pretty girl.
author: Jean Pigozzi

quote: I think I'm pretty smart on what I spend my money on. I still don't have a new car, I drive my old car that I've had forever. But I bought a house in downtown Chicago.
author: Chris O'Donnell

quote: I don't act because I love doing it, I act because it's my job. At the end of the year, I gotta pay my taxes, bills, doctors, insurance, car insurance, the occasional vacation. It's a wonderful job. The upside is that it is exciting and different... the downside is that it is an extremely insecure job.
author: Clint Howard

quote: You have to visualize a second or two ahead of your car what line you are taking, what you are going to do, before you get there because it comes too fast.
author: Emerson Fittipaldi

quote: As far as luxury goes, about the only thing I do is... I go first class all the way. I live on the road, so when I'm out there, I'm getting the nice hotel suite, I'm getting the luxury car, I'm eating the good food, and I make sure I take care of myself on the road.
author: Trish Stratus

quote: I did archery when I was in high school. In our gym class we had two weeks of archery, and I remember taking the bow and arrow and firing it up and across the street into a car parking lot.
author: John Barrowman

quote: The alarm rings 4:45, again at 5, but I wake up 4:30 naturally. Shower, shave, orange juice, perk my own coffee, hear the news, and the CBS car arrives 5:30.
author: Charlie Rose

quote: I don't even possess a car. I ride in auto-rickshaws because I like to be a part of the masses. I don't want to single myself out as someone up and above.
author: Shakuntala Devi

quote: Growing up in the Midwest, people don't drive Porsches and Ferraris. They drive Fords and Chevys. And so even if you have the opportunity to buy a more expensive car, it doesn't occur to you because it's not what you relate to.
author: Luke Perry

quote: I think we built the right future. If it's a choice between the flying car or the Internet, tablets and smartphones, I'll take what we've got.
author: David Gerrold

quote: I've got a nice car. I love my job. I've got a bagel store, and I have breakfast every morning with friends I grew up with. I've been in movies, I've written books - I don't know how that all happened.
author: Larry King

quote: I love to drive. My present to myself from 'The Tudors' was a red Mazda MX5 hard-top convertible. I loved that car, and also what she represented - my first success.
author: Natalie Dormer

quote: Sometimes, when my wife and I were going out to dinner, I would take my laptop with me and work in the car, so as to take advantage of the half hour going and coming.
author: Thomas Friedman

quote: Politicians don't like to face unpleasant realities. In truth, nobody does, but as individuals, we have no choice; if we neglect to plan ahead, we are held accountable. Fail to meet your responsibilities at work, and you get fired. Ignore your car's gas gauge, and you get stranded.
author: Nathan Myhrvold

quote: In 2010, I sold my car, a Toyota Majester, for just a lakh-and-a-half to be able to feed my horses. It continues to be like a hole, where I put all my money.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: My first car was a Toyota 4Runner when I was 17. I paid for it myself. I was very happy.
author: Apolo Ohno

quote: There are certain times I don't want my picture taken. If my wife's stepping out of a car and it looks like it's going to come out an indecent picture, don't I have a right to object?
author: Bobby Darin

quote: I just want real creative freedom without worrying about, you know, car payments.
author: Sean Penn

quote: The parents of teenagers would love to have a car that won't go very far or go very fast. They could just cruise around the neighborhood, drive it to school, see their friends, plug it in overnight.
author: Clayton Christensen

quote: Food is not just what we put in our mouths to fill up; it is culture and identity. Reason plays some role in our decisions about food, but it's rarely driving the car.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: When cars honk and hoot and drunks squeeze out of car windows and scream, you can be sure that football is in the air.
author: Craig Brown

quote: My buildings are not particularly expensive. It is not a tin shed. If you want a tinny car, you pay for that.
author: Zaha Hadid

quote: I still think I'm like the poor girl from Colorado who worked three jobs to buy a car. That's still my mentality, so I'll be walking down the street, and I forget what I do and who I am.
author: Amy Adams

quote: I have been in Formula One for 12 years, and out of that I had one year with the perfect car.
author: Michael Schumacher

quote: I'd kind of like to have a classic old muscle car. I think that would be fun.
author: Brooke Burke

quote: I know I will die in a car crash.
author: Katie Price

quote: I drank a lot when I was a teenager and I don't drink any more, because that's when I thought, you know, I'm gonna end up a car wreck.
author: Kristin Davis

quote: I never thought being the producer was being the dictator. It means being the director and being the coach. It's a way of keeping everybody focused on the goal, and also having final say. Everybody can be in the same car, but somebody has to drive.
author: Paul Stanley

quote: I've already established my (political)machinery. It's like a car. It's fixed already. You just have to get in and drive it.
author: Manny Pacquiao

quote: I've always been a bit of a car freak.
author: Eric Bana

quote: There are writers, and I know some of them, who are very disciplined. Who write, like, four pages a day, every day. And it doesn't matter if their dog got run over by a car that day, or they won the Irish sweepstakes. I'm not one of those writers.
author: George R. R. Martin

quote: Johnny Guitar... just one of my favorite singers of all time. I met him when we were both on the road with Johnny Otis in the '50s when I was a teenager. We traveled the country in a car together. I would hear him sing every night.
author: Etta James

quote: Someday we'll look back on this moment and plow into a parked car.
author: Evan Davis

quote: As a child, I did what any normal kid who grew up without any electricity would do - I spent countless hours working on a computer wired to my parents' car battery... and learned how to code. This natural passion for computers lead me into the Internet market during the late 1990s and early 2000s.
author: Ryan Holmes

quote: I'm still that little girl who lisped and sat in the back of the car and threw vegetables at the back of her head when we drove home from the market. That never goes.
author: Tracey Ullman

quote: My original aim after 'The X Factor' was to earn enough money in a year to make the whole experience worth it - you know, buy a car, a flat.
author: Olly Murs

quote: I'm sure there are close calls that we're not even aware of hundreds of times a year. You cross the street, and if you'd crossed the street two minutes later, you'd have been hit by a car, but you'd never know it. I'm sure that kind of stuff happens all the time.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: I'm lucky because my dad taught me to be frugal and save. And that's important because I want to know that I don't have to take an acting job for two or three years if I don't want to and that I'll still be able to make my house and car payments and buy food for my dogs.
author: Ashley Greene

quote: Sacrifice counts for a lot in sport. From a young age, I couldn't do the normal things that the boys of my age get to do. Maybe you have a nice car or a nice house, but at times you just want to be a normal guy and you can't.
author: Mario Balotelli

quote: Over my lifetime, the car had actually transcended the fact that it is a car. It has become a venue.
author: Eric Bana

quote: When I was a kid I got busted for throwing a rock through a car window and egging a house on halloween.
author: Gavin DeGraw

quote: Especially in the car ride to and from gym. I find myself spacing out a lot, just visualizing what the Olympics would be like and just having such great role models.
author: Aly Raisman

quote: Being a pedestrian again is very exciting because in L.A. you live in your car, and you're on a freeway all the time.
author: Nicole Ari Parker

quote: My first car was a 1999 red Mazda Protege.
author: Ike Barinholtz

quote: I am so pathetic with machines in real life, it's not a joke. I'd rather walk, or even run, than take the car out myself. I like to be driven around. Yes, I like fancy cars, and fancy bikes, too. It's my dream to learn how to ride one myself, but for now, I am content being driven around.
author: Bipasha Basu

quote: I arrived in California with no job, no car, and no money, but, like millions of other girls, a dream.
author: Victoria Principal

quote: I am 'Mr. Karaoke Guy' in the car completely. I just go with it and don't care what anyone else thinks - I'm singing, man!
author: Drake Bell

quote: It sounds like something from a Woody Guthrie song, but it's true; I was raised in a freight car.
author: Merle Haggard

quote: I used to do films for money earlier. I never knew what perception meant. I didn't give too much attention to scripts. It was either to buy a house or to buy a car. There was a certain frivolity to the way I used to pick up things. I wasn't taking my career seriously.
author: Emraan Hashmi

quote: McDonald's revolutionized fast food. They introduced a way to eat food without knives, forks or plates. Most fast foods can be eaten while steering the wheel of a car and the restaurants are usually drive through.
author: Eric Schlosser

quote: With all the hybrid stuff and things like that, I think that's a fabulous direction to go with cars in that sense. As someone who grew up around muscle cars, I'll never not be able to not love a muscle car. Not that I don't care about the environment, that's not it. But I adore muscle cars.
author: Michael Symon

quote: When our markets work, people throughout our economy benefit - Americans seeking to buy a car or buy a home, families borrowing to pay for college, innovators borrowing on the strength of a good idea for a new product or technology, and businesses financing investments that create new jobs.
author: Henry Paulson

quote: I lived in small town out in the desert and my friend used to steal his mom's car in the middle of the night. He'd drive over to my house, I'd sneak out and we'd go out to the desert and just burn things down.
author: Mark Hoppus

quote: I am a horrible visual artist. I can't fix a car, sew, knit, cook, etc. Statistically, there is more I don't do than do.
author: Carrie Brownstein

quote: Ninety-eight percent of the singing I did was private singing - it was in the shower, at the dishwasher, driving my car, singing with the radio, whatever. I can't do any of that now. I wish I could. I don't miss performing, particularly, but I miss singing.
author: Linda Ronstadt

quote: I'm constantly saying that I have bad hair days when I'm in New York. It's so hard. I've been lucky enough to jump immediately into a car, head straight to the location, and stay in the air-conditioning.
author: Christina Hendricks

quote: Megaupload was a dual-use technology. You can use it for good things, and you can use it for bad things. If someone sends something illegal in an envelope through your postal service, you don't shut down the post office. If someone speeds with the car he just bought, you don't go to the car manufacturer and say, 'Hey, we're shutting you down.'
author: Kim Dotcom

quote: I don't want a flashy car, just something that would allow me to stop using the Tube. And it would be good not to have to rely on my mum all the time, particularly when I have to listen to her singing in her car.
author: Andy Murray

quote: Growing up in Southern California, it's all car culture. When I was a kid, I knew every single model of every single car dealer; I knew every style of every year.
author: Cheech Marin

quote: A lot of money eliminates a category of worry. If your car breaks down, you're still going to get through the day. But it doesn't make you a happy person if you weren't a happy person before.
author: Gary David Goldberg

quote: My sense of injustice about our family's 'weirdness' in not owning a car was amplified by the fact that we did not own a television, either - my parents were unapologetic about this and told me very cheerfully that I would thank them for it when I was older, which was quite true.
author: Eleanor Catton

quote: If you've got a plot the size of a car or a tiny yard in Italy, you're going to be growing tomatoes and basil and celery and carrots, and everybody is still connected to the land.
author: Frances Mayes

quote: My dad was a physician. As a kid, I remember driving around with him on weekends so he could do his rounds at the hospital and talk to patients. We'd spend time in the car talking about what was going on with them, their stories.
author: Pierre Omidyar

quote: When I do a T.V. show, I hear all these artists in their dressing rooms doing scales - I've never done it because I've never had voice training. What I do to prepare is get in my car and sing along to the radio for about 20 minutes.
author: Bonnie Tyler

quote: When you're young, you need to be silly and be stupid and not be trying to do that when you're 40 in a red sports car.
author: Gin Wigmore

quote: L.A. has a fantastic car scene and because the climate is so gentle, cars can last forever.
author: Lee Child

quote: I took guitar a while back, and my heart wasn't in it at the time, but I'm ready to try it again. I sing in the car, at home - it's a huge part of my life, especially since I'm from Tennessee.
author: Lucy Hale

quote: Bond doesn't have an inner life. There would be moments when I'd think, 'We need to gather our thoughts here and have a breather,' where in another novel you'd slow the pace, have some description and see what Bond feels about this. But Bond doesn't reflect. All you can do is move on to the next bomb or shark or car.
author: Sebastian Faulks

quote: As soon as I began to earn what might be called fairly large sums, I bought a car and began to explore the country around New York.
author: Kate Smith

quote: Driving will never be away from me - I can't just give it up. It's all I've ever done, and there's something about being in that car.
author: Jimmie Johnson

quote: You don't have control of the car, but you can drive it. Life takes you where it wants you to go and where you need to go.
author: Art Alexakis

quote: The driver of a racing car is a component. When I first began, I used to grip the steering wheel firmly, and I changed gear so hard that I damaged my hand.
author: Juan Manuel Fangio

quote: A man from a primitive culture who sees an automobile might guess that it was powered by the wind or by an antelope hidden under the car, but when he opens up the hood and sees the engine he immediately realizes that it was designed.
author: Michael Behe

quote: Cotton Owens was leading and daddy was second. They came up on me and I moved over to let them pass. Cotton went on, but daddy bumped me in the rear and my car went right into the wall.
author: Richard Petty

quote: A human being is still more likely to die of a bee sting, snake bite or, Lord knows, automobile accident than by shark attack. We do not execute the perpretrators of death by car. We should not butcher an animal for an inadvertent homicide.
author: Peter Benchley

quote: I've done maybe twelve of Shakespeare's plays. I was with the Royal Shakespeare Company for years. Whatever influence that has never leaves you. If you learn to drive a car, and you learn the right way if there is ever a right way. You learn the good aspects, you learn to drive properly. And that never leaves you.
author: Charles Dance

quote: So, I remember when I was a kid, I was waiting for my mom to come home when she was working late, and, you know, I was like, 'Oh my God, what happened to her? Is she OK? Did something happen to her getting in the car?' I was a little kid. But those are actually early onsets of anxiety.
author: Vinny Guadagnino

quote: Self-driving cars will enable car-sharing even in spread-out suburbs. A car will come to you just when you need it. And when you are done with it, the car will just drive away, so you won't even have to look for parking.
author: Sebastian Thrun

quote: I married a pretty famous girl, and when we drive through town there's usually a car following us, when I walk out of my front door in Chelsea there's six guys waiting for me.
author: Kevin Pietersen

quote: I mostly drive around in a Fiat 500 TwinAir, and that's a pretty small car!
author: Richard Hammond

quote: You don't want to engage in road rage when the person in the next car might be your child's future teacher or your dentist's father.
author: Kim Edwards

quote: Hospital-acquired infections are now killing more people every year in the United States than die from AIDS or cancer or car accidents combined - about 100,000.
author: Janine Benyus

quote: When I'm doing kitchen planning as well as bathroom design, I try to walk through the day with the homeowner. If we're talking about a kitchen, it will be: So, we are walking in with the groceries. When we are taking them out of the car, where will they go? What is the distance to fridge, to pantry?
author: Candice Olson

quote: The keyboard is my whole life. My life is centered around either sitting at my keyboard or driving my car. Those are the two most important things, more than anything else. Being at my keyboard, it's the happiest time for me.
author: Brian Wilson

quote: Man, coaching is a hard job, and it requires a lot of time... I hear stories from coaches who tell me that players call them in the middle of the night not knowing where they parked their car. You are baby-sitting rich, spoiled kids... I don't know where you parked your car!
author: Joe Montana

quote: There is no secret, once we go to qualifying, we all seem to enjoy it. Qualifying is all about putting everything that you have and that the car has in one lap. It's like a rush, I really enjoy that.
author: Sebastian Vettel

quote: The challenge in most car chases is you're trying to hide the fact that it's not the actor driving.
author: Christopher McQuarrie

quote: I was so wild and crazy and dumb in my car. It didn't run but 30 miles an hour. You made do.
author: Muddy Waters

quote: If one's honest about it, spending time in a car with children is pretty ghastly.
author: Arabella Weir

quote: I'd like to have the flying car, I think that'd be really cool.
author: Rupert Grint

quote: My dirty little secret is I don't drive at all, though I have my license and I renew it every five years. I'm phobic. I keep worrying if I drive, I'll end up killing someone. I hoped that by writing about a car crash, I might understand and heal this phobia, but I didn't! I'm still phobic.
author: Caroline Leavitt

quote: You cannot expect the guy who drove the car into the ditch to navigate it out of the ditch. You have to put a new driver in the seat. I'm not saying the new driver is going to be any better, but we need a new driver. Kerry is the only choice.
author: John Mellencamp

quote: Racing a thoroughbred grand prix car in front of a home crowd will be a surreal and mighty experience.
author: Nigel Mansell

quote: Natural DNA is a tractless coil, like an unwound and tangled audiotape on the floor of the car in the dark.
author: Kary Mullis

quote: I haven't got a car or a house. I've got a wife, but I didn't pay for her! I spend all my money on my glorious wife. She's here with a knife at my throat!
author: Mackenzie Crook

quote: In L.A., I don't really want to go out because traffic sucks so bad. I'm sorry, I'm not going to spend five hours a day in my car, so you have to choose where you live very carefully.
author: Holly Madison

quote: I always try to say, 'If you want to help the environment, try to do just two things. One, use less of your car. Second, separate your garbage.'
author: Jaime Lerner

quote: A car to pick me up every day, a chair with my name on it, everybody being very polite... what can you do except sit back and watch it all, try to take it all in?
author: Charles Dance

quote: Television is such an evolving medium. When you're doing a TV show, it's not like you just shoot for six weeks and you're in an editing room with all of your footage. It's like a guitar or a car, you have to fine tune things. You stop doing what's not working, you work on what is working and you add things that do work.
author: Chris Pratt
